specs.<a href=\"https://www.garmin.com/en-AU/: IPX6 and IPX7 (front panel only, when properly installed)
specs.Wireless frequencies/protocols:
Bluetooth®: 2.4 GHz @ +12 dBm nominal
ANT®: 2.4 GHz @ +7 dBm nominal
specs.Rated power output (4 Ohm): 26 watts RMS x 4 @ 14.4 V input < 10% THD
specs.Built-in Digital Signal Processing (DSP): Yes (with custom DSP profile setup using Fusion-Link™ app)
specs.Control: Yes (MFD, smart device and Garmin watch)
specs.Multi-language interface: Bulgarian, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Portuguese-Portugal, Slovenian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish
specs.Supported sources:
AM, FM, Bluetooth®, USB audio, iPhone®, iPod®, AUX x1, MTP
SiriusXM-Ready (U.S. only, requires optional SiriusXM Connect vehicle tuner)
DAB+ ready (available in Europe and Australia only)
specs.Line out: 2 (L + R per zone, requires external amplification)
specs.Subwoofer out: 2 (1 mono output per zone, requires external amplification)
